title: Routes optimizations
text:
.Minimizing the length of a route given multiple appointments.
.Scheduling new appointments with route optimization in mind.
(Python, Flask, Leaflet, Google Maps API, Google Agenda Api)

more.text: This software is intended for my previous employer Prop Lavage, but the skeleton was made flexible to accomodate anyone who needs to plan routes. Work in progress (backend: almost done, frontend: to do!)

title: Internship at Coyote Am√©rique
text: I participated in the R&D division working on the next version of Coyote, an app/device that competes with Google Maps in Europe. As a full-stack developer, I created a monitoring tool designed for my team and other colleagues. Throughout this project, I gained proficiency in Go, Vue.js, Docker, gRPC, Apache Kafka, and Kubernetes. I also honed my skills in Git and Bash. Specifically for Vue.js, I served as a scout, introducing and presenting the technology to my peers. I am very happy with this internship and am grateful for my colleagues who were very knowledgeable and generous.

title: Snake Game
text: Simple C++ game featuring a bot that uses the Dijkstra algorithm implemented in O(n). When the apple is not in reach, the X represents the most hopeful escape. The snake should zig-zag without blocking it. In progress.

title: Web Scraper
text:
Automatically shops on the web, looking for products with specific characteristics under a price threshold. It updates a sheets document and notifies me.
(Python, Selenium, Google apis)

title: Transactions parser
text:
Automated personal finance analysis. The user inputs bank statements, and transactions are graphically expressed by category.
(Python, Tesseract-OCR, Google Sheets api)

title: Web Game
text:
A game intended for movie buffs who want to challenge their knowledge of their favorite movies.
(Python, Flask, ffmpeg, Cloudinary api, html, js)

title: Minishell
text: A shell written in C that immitates bash. It supports pipes, redirections, wildcards, tab completion and more! Developed as part of my studies at 42 with a friend.

title: Map projection
text: A C program that displays an isometric wireframe map. Slopes can be exaggerated, the map can be rotated with 90 degrees increments.

title: FLahk
text: Sits on top and improves FL Studio by speeding up the workflow and putting the user in unforseen situations, fostering creativity. This project is the combination of my passion for music, programming and experimentation.

title: Philosophers
text: A C program completed as part of my studies at 42 where N threads must share ressources fairly. I worked with threads, mutexes, forks and semaphores.

title: ft_irc
text: A chat server in C++ that follows the IRC protocol. Compatible with any IRC client. Our tester ensures it stays reliable under stress.
